string.name: ccl_app_name
string.translation_description: Cast Companion Library

resources.string: Kompletterande Cast-bibliotek

string.name: ccl_version
string.translation_description: Cast Companion Library version

string.name: ccl_media_route_menu_title
string.translation_description: Cast button label

resources.string: Fortsätt spela …

string.name: ccl_live
string.translation_description: Live media content

resources.string: Live

string.name: ccl_cancel
string.translation_description: Cancel button for dialog

resources.string: Avbryt

string.name: ccl_on
string.translation_description: Switch on

resources.string: På

string.name: ccl_off
string.translation_description: Switch off

resources.string: Av

string.name: ccl_info_na
string.translation_description: Information About Cast device Not Available

resources.string: Informationen är inte tillgänglig

string.name: ccl_ok
string.translation_description: OK for dialog button

resources.string: OK

string.name: ccl_error
string.translation_description: Error title for dialog

resources.string: Fel

string.name: ccl_casting_to_device
string.translation_description: Casting to Cast device

resources.string: Castar via %1$s

string.name: ccl_loading
string.translation_description: Loading media content

resources.string: Läser in …

string.name: ccl_no_media_info
string.translation_description: No information about media available

resources.string: Ingen medieinformation tillgänglig

string.name: ccl_session_reconnection_attempt
string.translation_description: Attempting to recover previous Cast session

resources.string: Försöker återuppta föregående session …

string.name: ccl_failed_to_launch_app
string.translation_description: Failed to launch Cast application

resources.string: Det gick inte att starta programmet

string.name: ccl_failed_app_launch_timeout
string.translation_description: The request to launch the Cast application has timed out!

resources.string: Begäran om att starta programmet tog för lång tid!

string.name: ccl_failed_to_find_app
string.translation_description: The application you are trying to launch is not available on your Cast device

resources.string: Programmet du försöker starta finns inte på din Chromecast-enhet

string.name: ccl_failed_to_play
string.translation_description: Failed to start the playback of media

resources.string: Det gick inte att starta uppspelning av media

string.name: ccl_failed_to_stop
string.translation_description: Failed to stop the playback of media

resources.string: Det gick inte att stoppa uppspelning av media

string.name: ccl_failed_to_pause
string.translation_description: Failed to pause the playback of media

resources.string: Det gick inte att pausa uppspelning av media

string.name: ccl_failed_unknown
string.translation_description: An unknown error was encountered

resources.string: Ett okänt fel inträffade

string.name: ccl_failed_to_connect
string.translation_description: Could not connect to the Cast device

resources.string: Det gick inte att ansluta till enheten

string.name: ccl_failed_setting_volume
string.translation_description: Failed to set the volume in the Cast device

resources.string: Det gick inte att ställa in volymen

string.name: ccl_failed_no_connection
string.translation_description: No connection to the Cast device is present

resources.string: Det finns ingen anslutning till Cast-enheten

string.name: ccl_failed_no_connection_short
string.translation_description: No connection to Cast device

resources.string: Ingen anslutning

string.name: ccl_failed_no_connection_trans
string.translation_description: Connection to the cast device has been lost. Application is trying to re-establish the connection, if possible. Please wait for a few seconds and try again.

resources.string: Anslutningen till Cast-enheten avbröts. Programmet försöker återupprätta anslutningen om det är möjligt. Vänta några sekunder och försök sedan igen.

string.name: ccl_failed_perform_action
string.translation_description: Failed to perform the action on the Cast device

resources.string: Det gick inte att utföra åtgärden

string.name: ccl_failed_status_request
string.translation_description: Failed to sync up with the Cast device

resources.string: Det gick inte att synkronisera med den Cast-enheten

string.name: ccl_failed_load
string.translation_description: Failed to load media on the cast device

resources.string: Det gick inte att läsa in media på Cast-enheten

string.name: ccl_failed_seek
string.translation_description: Failed to seek to the new position on the cast device

resources.string: Det gick inte att ställa in den nya positionen på Cast-enheten

string.name: ccl_failed_receiver_player_error
string.translation_description: Receiver player has encountered a sever error

resources.string: Ett serverfel har inträffat på mottagarspelaren

string.name: ccl_failed_authorization_timeout
string.translation_description: Authorization timed out

resources.string: Auktoriseringen tog för lång tid

string.name: ccl_failed_to_set_track_style
string.translation_description: Failed to update the Captions style.

resources.string: Det gick inte att uppdatera textformatet.
